name: Death's Door (Chairian)
description:
This is a game made in 2017 for an Apocalypticism in Film class assignment. A short game that lets you speak with Death for a few minutes. Will you die? Will you live? Who knows? Come to terms with your own mortality in this little experiment.
Controls: Use the spacebar to advance through the dialogue and the mouse to make decisions.
(The banner is lying to you, you have to actually download the game to play it. Life isn't always fair.)
